question: Who defeated the Marathas in the third battle of Panipat?
explanation: Towards the middle of the 18th century, the Marathas, under the leadership of the Peshwas had established their sway over Haryana and most of North India. The incursion of the Afghan, Ahmed Shah Abdali, into India, culminated in the third battle of Panipat on January 14, 1761.
